tooltips.allowedGeometryTypes: GeoJson types the user can choose from.
tooltips.defaultGeometryType: When using Feature type, this determines the geometry type for the coordinate input UI.
tooltips.geoJsonType: The type of GeoJSON object this field should accept. Default is Feature which allows single geographic features with properties.
tooltips.maxFeatures: For FeatureCollection type, limits the maximum number of features that can be stored. Range: 1-1000.
tooltips.validateGeometry: When enabled, the field will validate that the GeoJSON conforms to the specification including coordinate bounds checking.
